name: jira_get_boards
description: List all Jira boards (Scrum and Kanban) in the instance. Returns board names, types, and project info.

steps.code: const baseUrl = `{{jira_url}}`.replace(/\/$/, ''); const resp = await fetch(baseUrl + '/rest/agile/1.0/board?maxResults=50', { credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) throw new Error('Boards API error: ' + resp.status); const data = await resp.json(); const boards = (data.values || []).map(b => ({ id: b.id, name: b.name, type: b.type, project: b.location?.projectName || '' })); return { total: data.total || boards.length, result_count: boards.length, boards: boards }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Fetch boards via Agile REST API
